EmailTemplate.name: CDF Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for coming, {!Contact.FirstName}!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for attending our {!Campaign.Name} on {!Campaign.EndDate}. Once we have record that you have attended all the required hours of training to receive your bonus, we will submit your information to the State of Washington for payment.
You must claim your bonus on your invoice from the State.
Thanks again for joining us!
-The Imagine Institute
{!$Setup.c501_cm__Imagine_Settings__c.c501_cm__Email_SMS_Unsub_Text__c}
